#include <bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;

typedef long long ll;
ll Multiply(ll a, int n, ll k) {
    ll ans = 0;
    while (n) {
        if (n & 1) {
            ans += a;
            if (ans >= k) ans -= k;
        }
        a <<= 1;
        if (a >= k) a -= k;
        n >>= 1;
    }
    return ans;
}

int main() {
    #ifndef ONLINE_JUDGE
        freopen("input.txt", "r", stdin);
        freopen("output.txt", "w", stdout);
    #endif

    int TC;
    scanf("%d", &TC);

    while (TC--) {
        int n;
        ll b;
        scanf("%d%lld", &n, &b);

        ll p = 1;
        for (int i = 2; i <= n; ++i)
            p = Multiply(p, i, b << 1);

        if (p >= b) puts("Odd");
        else puts("Even");
    }

    return 0;
}
